summary:
Senior Strategist ● Global experience in EMEA & USA ● Specialized in content planning  ● E-commerce and Shopify experience

For the last two years I have been working as a freelance strategist on long-term projects with brands such as Seek Discomfort, We Are Eves & NEOM. In my most recent full-time position, I was the Social Director at AKQA Dubai, where I was overseeing a team of 12 and worked with clients like Levi's, Louis Vuitton, Dubai College of Tourism, and Krispy Kreme. 

I'm a social media fanatic turned strategist here to ideate and create for brands that are looking to be customer-centric, ahead of their curve, and learn how to utilize digital channels to their fullest. 

I believe in the power of collaborating directly with brand owners to guide creative work powered by human insights and data. I'm a supporter of female-led businesses and companies that put mental wellness at the forefront of their objectives.

You can always reach me through bakinam.sherif@gmail.com.

Let’s connect and chat.
